choice.CHOOSE_TEXT: We want to give you the best possible information. That is why we are asking you to make a choice from the following roles:
choice.FREELANCER: Boutique firm or self employed professional

menu-items.NOT_A_SUPPLIER: Not a temp staffing or consulting firm?
menu-items.NOT_A_FREELANCER: Not a self employed professional or boutique firm?

hirer.HERO_TEXT: So your dream is about a fully automated flex supply chain? You want to run the lead in a process without unnecessary supplier lock-in? We think that dream makes sense! Join the collaborative flex experience
hirer.KIT_TEXT: Corporate integration software that has been made equally simple as ordering something like an internet subscription? That was the goal! Born in the cloud, with a natural thought about collaboration, that asks for swift solutioning and that is exactly what you will be getting.
hirer.INTRO_TITLE: If you are familiar with hiring flex workers you know what we mean
hirer.INTRO_TEXT: There are quite a few systems and processes in circulation and what is best for your organization often causes problems with your suppliers. How do you link your optimization in purchasing, time registration and HR systems to a smooth process at the supplier? You do not want to have any unnecessary costs and you do not want custom-made integrations!
hirer.CONNECT: Connect with your purchasing system or HR process
hirer.CONNECT_SUBTITLE: A complete menu of connectivity options  standardizes your optimization for integration.
hirer.CONNECT_TEXT: The most special thing about FlexForceMonkey is that it is not very demanding on your system. Whether you want to shop with us from a catalog buying process via punch-out, or you require a data feed as HR master data. Whether you want to participate with or without a time registration system. We have a combinable solution for all common choices. And we connect your supplier(s) for you following the digital desires they have. We think that is simple online collaboration.

supplier.HERO_TEXT: Stop operations battles on PO numbers and billable hours that do not fit in the labor agreement: join the collaborative flex experience
supplier.KIT_INTRO: Online in no time: the FlexForceMonkey connectivity kit!
supplier.KIT_TEXT: Corporate integration software that has been made equally simple as ordering something like an internet subscription? That was the goal! Born in the cloud, with a natural thought about collaboration, that asks for swift solutioning and that is exactly what you will be getting.
supplier.GET_KIT: ORDER OUR FREE KIT NOW WITHOUT ANY OBLIGATIONS
supplier.INTRO_SUBTITLE: We think bills have to be paid and money has to flow, so when an invoice is based on correct services we simply think it should be set payable without further hassles.
supplier.INTRO_TEXT_1: We see high costs at many temps agencies because invoices from customers come to a stand still in the process. This leads to processing costs to provide release information, but this also generates huge interest costs because money is simply transferred too late.
supplier.AGENCY_SUBTITLE: FlexForceMonkey believes in an online market and thus makes collaborative processing possible for everyone.
supplier.AGENCY_TEXT: The FlexForceMonkey platform connects effortlessly to your processes via HR-XML messaging, but you can also choose to work manually and manage resources and time in our online portal. In all cases we connect your customer(s) following their digital preferences. We think that is simple online collaboration.
supplier.REGISTER_ACCOUNT: REGISTER NOW FOR AN ONLINE ACCOUNT
supplier.PS: PS: have you already heard that working on our online portal is just free for now ?!

freelancer.HERO_TEXT: Surely you once started out to create added value? We are positive it was not your dream to be busy with doing your administration! Join the collaborative flex experience
freelancer.INTRO_TITLE: Being busy with your dream is a substantial job
freelancer.INTRO_SUBTITLE: So why would you waste your energy on managing timesheets and chasing invoices?
freelancer.INTRO_TEXT: FlexForceMonkey does not just offer software for time registration, we offer a platform that was inspired from cooperation between customer and supplier. So here you do not just make a timesheet, with this software you can control and communicate this time with your customer directly. And that is available in the standard solution.
freelancer.REGISTER_ACCOUNT: REGISTER NOW FOR AN ONLINE ACCOUNT
freelancer.TRY_SUBTITLE: Are you curious enough to get started? You can easily get online with FlexForceMonkey yourself!
freelancer.TRY_TEXT: We believe in the future of flex work. We see it as the fabric that holds our economic future together. It is our dream that the entire flex industry will be online and connected. This way we are sure that everything can be more efficient, but on top of that we think that this will benefit the transparency and therefore honesty for all parties involved.
freelancer.TRY_NOW: JOIN NOW AND REGISTER YOUR ACCOUNT
freelancer.WORK_TITLE: Collaboration is the standard with us
freelancer.WORK_TEXT: So quickly create a company account, enter your flex resources and invite your customer(s) to connect and review your timesheets online. For the time being, FlexForceMonkey is also completely free of charge. So getting on board now will definitely bring you additional benefits.

home.HERO_TEXT: One platform where temps agency, flex client, self-employed professional and consulting firm work together on an efficient and transparant process
home.HOME_INTRO: FlexForceMonkey is smart integration software that makes it easier business partners to collaborate in online processes. It ensures a seamless connection between administrations. To show you how we can help, we would like to know your role in the flex supply chain. Just click one of the following options to go the relevant website.

cookie.BANNER_TEXT: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. We do this by keeping track of the parts of the site that you visit, so we get a better understanding of how to be of assistance. This cookies are only accessed when you re-enter our website. We do not track or otherwise leverage this data when you are not on our website.

contact-section.INTRO: Interest in FlexForceMonkey? Or do you have questions? Please fill in the following form and we will contact you as soon as possible.
contact-section.NAME: Name
contact-section.SUBJECT: Subject
contact-section.SEND_SUCCESS: Your form has been sent successfully. We will contact you as soon as possible!
contact-section.SEND_ERROR: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later!

database.LOG_IN_INTRO: Only an admin can see this page.

connect.FILL_IN: Leave your information to request the connectivity kit
connect.SEND_SUCCESS: Your request has been sent. You'll get the connectivity kit as soon as possible!
connect.SEND_ERROR: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later!
connect.NAME: Name
connect.EMAIL_NEWSLETTERS: Email address may be used for newsletters
connect.EMAIL_PRODUCT_UPDATES: Email address may be used for product updates
connect.EMAIL_INDIVIDUAL_CONTACT: Email address may be used for targeted individual commercial contact
connect.USE_CONTACT: We only use this data for the shipment of our connectivity kit and for follow-up on receipt.

newsletter.OPENS_NEW_TAB: Stay up to date? Register now for our newsletter!
